name: ReTruth Project (Alpha)
description:
Welcome to Retruth!

Currently, this is Alpha 5.03, and more updates are to come, but only after i manage to get inspired to work on it again.

Currently, there is:

A Console

A Game

1 Questgiver NPC

1 Quest

Consumable Items

Many Enemies to fight

a Shop

Currency

Music that isn't actually implemented into the game, but it's on the site so you can listen to it.

Game made in pure Javascript and HTML from scratch, no outside APIs or Game Engines were used in the making of this game, and no animals were harmed either.

Game also made solely by yours truly.

This game was originally published on a google site, which you can find here, and has more descriptive text than this description which i think is already getting too long.

bye bye have fun!
